author: kfogel
msg: (rep_read_range): Put offset arg right after rep, so that buf and
len are together.  This is more intuitive.  All callers changed.

author: kfogel
msg: (rep_read_range): Remove unnecessary local prototype; this function
is defined before all of its callers.

author: kfogel
msg: More work on issue #649: Lose the unused `offset' parameter when
creating a stream for representation reading.  (This is to simplify
checksum calculation; since we'll always know that we started at the
beginning of the rep's contents, the only question will be whether we
hit the end by the time we closed the stream.)
(svn_fs__rep_contents_read_stream): Lose offset arg, and don't pass
(rep_read_get_baton): Lose offset arg, just initialize b->offset to 0.
